OriginalUserStory.Title: User Login
OriginalUserStory.Description: As a user, I want to log in with my email and password so I can access my dashboard.
AcceptanceCriteria: Email and password fields are present

ImprovedUserStory.Title: Secure User Login
ImprovedUserStory.Description: As a registered user, I want to log in with my email and password so I can securely access my personalized dashboard.
AcceptanceCriteria: Email and password fields are present and follow security guidelines
System validates credentials against the database
Shows error message on failure with retry option
Redirects to personalized dashboard on success with user-specific data
ImprovedUserStory.AdditionalInformation: Assumes user registration is already implemented

Independent.explanation: The original story is somewhat dependent on the registration feature. The improved story clarifies this assumption.
Independent.recommendation: Consider splitting the story into two: one for registration and one for login.

Negotiable.explanation: The original story is too high-level and doesn't leave room for negotiation. The improved story provides more details, allowing for discussion on security guidelines and error messaging.
Negotiable.recommendation: Involve stakeholders in the discussion to ensure the story meets their expectations.

Valuable.explanation: The original story provides value by enabling users to access their dashboard. The improved story adds more value by emphasizing security and personalization.
Valuable.recommendation: Ensure the story aligns with the product vision and goals.

Estimable.explanation: The original story is too vague, making it difficult to estimate. The improved story provides more details, making it easier to estimate the effort required.
Estimable.recommendation: Break down the story into smaller tasks to improve estimation accuracy.

Small.explanation: The original story is a bit too large, covering multiple aspects of login functionality. The improved story is still somewhat large but more focused.
Small.recommendation: Consider splitting the story into smaller ones, each focusing on a specific aspect of login functionality.

Testable.explanation: The original story has clear acceptance criteria, making it testable. The improved story adds more specific criteria, making it even more testable.
Testable.recommendation: Ensure the acceptance criteria are clear, concise, and measurable.

overall.summary: The improved user story is more specific, secure, and valuable. It provides more details, making it easier to estimate and test.
overall.refinement_summary:
* Added security guidelines to email and password fields
* Clarified the assumption of user registration
* Emphasized personalization on the dashboard
INVEST Score improved from 24/30 to 28/30
